articles.author: The Weather Channel
articles.title: Why Does the World Observe Earth Hour? | Weather.com - The Weather Channel
articles.description: Earth Hour famously began in Sydney, Australia back in 2007.
articles.content: By March-end every year, the world unites to show its collective support towards the planet by taking one iconic action: switching off all non-essential lights for 60 minutes to celebrate Earth Hour!… [+1487 chars]
